pages.text: Magnets make your life much better, they take items that drop on the floor and plop them in your inventory. They run on a durability per item collected and can be repaired in an anvil with Magnetite.
Cheap an functional magnet, get it as soon as you can and rightclick with it in your hand to activate it. (they dont make you more attractive thou)
Strongest magnet you can craft, good range and very instantly plop items in to your inventory
This is the best vault magnet you can get, but the magnet core can only be found as loot
